articles.author: Ellen Ioanes
articles.title: Why Russia has kept a Wall Street Journal reporter in jail for a year — and counting - Vox.com
articles.description: Evan Gershkovich’s case isn’t just about press freedom. It’s about geopolitics. The American reporter was charged with espionage, and just had three months added to his jail time.
articles.content:
Evan Gershkovich, the Wall Street Journal reporter detained in Russia on charges of spying, just had three months added to his jail time and he hasnt even gone to trial yet.

articles.author: Jonathan O'Callaghan
articles.title: North American eclipse 2024: How scientists will study it - BBC.com
articles.description: Rockets, planes, balloons and countless observers on the ground will be studying the North American total solar eclipse on 8 April in unprecedented detail.
